channel.title: Dark Souls on 0800 BEN
channel.description: Recent content in Dark Souls on 0800 BEN

item.title: Control Dark Souls with a piano
item.description: Controlling Dark Souls with a Piano? But Why?So i’ve had this midi piano keyboard for a while now but I don’t use it all that much. This project was intended to give me an excuse to use the keyboard more, with the hope being that it could help make me better at hitting specific notes or maybe even CHORDS. It didn’t quite pan out that way as I played for like half an hour and then gave up but it’s the thought that counts!

item.title: Other Game Maps
item.description: Maps are good. Here are some shitty maps from various games that don’t warrent their own page. Astral Chain Dark Souls 3 FTL Grim Dawn Heat Signature Left 4 Dead 2 Mario Odyssey Monaco Pokemon Emerald Sekiro Skyward Sword

item.title: Dark Souls Maps
item.description: Maps are good. Here’s some shitty maps of areas from Dark Souls. Undead Asylum Firelink Shrine Upper Undead Burg Undead Church The Depths New Londo Duke’s Archives!Dukes Archives Map 1](images/dark_souls_maps/Dukes_Archives1_Fullsize.jpg)
